Name: XenoPay – Paytm-Wallet
Desc:
Developed a Paytm-like digital wallet platform with responsive UI and secure backend using Next.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL.
• Frontend: Built a responsive Next.js UI with P2P transactions & money addition, improving UX by 60%.
• Backend: Developed fast transaction processing with Express.js & Node.js, boosting speed by 40%.
• Security: Integrated NextAuth & Bcrypt for authentication, enhancing security by 80%.
• Database: Used Prisma ORM & PostgreSQL for efficient data handling, reducing retrieval time by 30%.

Name: Hirrd – Next-Gen Employment Platform
Desc: Built a modern job portal with real-time Supabase backend and secure Clerk-based authentication, featuring role-based dashboards, advanced job search filters, and responsive UI with dark mode and animations. Enhanced user engagement, application tracking, and form validation using React Hook Form, Zod, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn UI.

Name: BlogNest –  AI Powered Blogging Platform
Desc:
Developed an interactive blogging platform using React.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express.js, and Prisma ORM, enhancing user experience and performance.
• Frontend: Designed an optimized UI with authentication, blog creation, editing, and exploration, improving load speed by 50%.
• Backend: Built a scalable Express.js & Prisma ORM backend, reducing response time by 50%.
• Security: Implemented JWT authentication, enhancing data protection by 40%.
